headline.main: CANADIAN PREMIER WARNS OF BIG LOSSES; Says 'All Our Armed Force' Will Be in Action in 1943

lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, Dec. 31 (Canadian Press) -- Prime Minister William Mackenzie King, in a New Year's message prepared for broadcast tonight, warned the Canadian people that "all our armed force" would be in action during 1943 and that they "must be prepared for heavy losses."
abstract: Warns Canadians of losses in war, New Yr's message
snippet: OTTAWA, Dec. 31 (Canadian Press) -- Prime Minister William Mackenzie King, in a New Year's message prepared for broadcast tonight, warned the Canadian people that "all our armed force" would be in action during 1943 and that they "must be prepared...
